key_actions.description: Key actions allow you to bind a key to a verbal phrase. Upon loading the program will ensure that the configured key is pressable. If not, the key will not load and will alert the end-user.

function_actions.description: Function to stop the program. Will send a stop signal to the control server, similar to pressing stop on the client.
Function to start the program. Will send a start signal to the control server, similar to pressing start on the client.
